actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce (Subsequently: Commerce, Science, and Transportation)
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce (Subsequently: Commerce, Science, and Transportation).
Pursuant to S. Res. 4, Committee name changed.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation discharged in Senate.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Rereferred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Commerce to assist in the construction of certain facilities.
short_title: Small Community Hydroelectric Generating Facility Assistance Act

summary.text: Small Community Hydroelectric Generating Facility Assistance Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Commerce to guarantee bonds and other obligations of States and localities to finance the construction of hydroelectric generating facilities. Imposes limitations and conditions upon guarantees to be made pursuant to this Act.

titles.title: Small Community Hydroelectric Generating Facility Assistance Act
A bill to authorize the Secretary of Commerce to assist in the construction of certain facilities.
